name: NATURE GIRL Crystal Shards Temporary Tattoo Set
description:
All the fun of real tattoos with none of the pain or long-term commitment! Adorn yourself with these delicate crystal shards.

Taken from Victoria's original illustrations, each 'tattoo' comes pre-cut and ready to wear with full application instructions included.

Every pack contains ten crystal shards. The delightful packaging made from recycled card and glassine makes them a perfect present too!

The tattoo designs are printed on professional-grade material as used on film sets. They will last up to five days depending on where you place them. Areas such as elbows and wrists may wear more quickly as they twist and turn. 
...

Dimensions: 
Crystal shards - approximately 4.5cm x 2.5cm 
...

Water-proof, non-toxic and skin-safe. Do not apply to broken skin. Not suitable for children under the age of 5. Remove with hot, soapy water.

The consumer takes full responsibility after purchase for the use of this product.

name: NATURE GIRL From the Forest - Sycamore  & Crystals Temporary Tattoo Set
description:
All the fun of real tattoos with none of the pain or long-term commitment! Adorn yourself with this beautiful large sycamore seed 'necklace', along with 6 individual seeds and delicate crystal shards.

Taken from Victoria's original illustrations, each 'tattoo' comes pre-cut and ready to wear with full application instructions included.

Every pack contains one large sycamore seed 'necklace', 6 individual seed and five crystal shards. The delightful packaging made from recycled card and glassine makes them a perfect present too! 

The tattoo designs are printed on professional-grade material as used on film sets. They will last up to five days depending on where you place them. Areas such as elbows and wrists may wear more quickly as they twist and turn. 
...

Dimensions: 
Sycamore Necklace - 27cm x 11cm at widest points 
Crystal Shards - approximately 4.5cm x 2.5cm
Sycamore Seeds - approximately 4.5cm x 3cm 
...

Water-proof, non-toxic and skin-safe. Do not apply to broken skin. Not suitable for children under the age of 5. Remove with hot soapy water.

The consumer takes full responsibility after purchase for the use of this product.

Taken from Victoria's original illustrations, each 'tattoo' comes pre-cut and ready to wear with full application instructions included.

Every pack contains one very large butterfly, two little butterflies and the five Platonic solids to wear together or separately. The delightful packaging made from recycled card and glassine makes them a perfect present too!

The tattoo designs are printed on professional-grade material as used on film sets. They will last up to five days depending on where you place them. Areas such as elbows and wrists may wear more quickly as they twist and turn. 
...

Dimensions: 
Large butterfly - 15cm x 13cm at widest points 
Small butterflies - approximately 5cm x 3cm 
Geometric shapes - approximately 2cm x 2cm each
...

Water-proof, non-toxic and skin-safe. Do not apply to broken skin. Not suitable for children under the age of 5. Remove with hot, soapy water.

name: Oh Floral Heart - Illustrated Greetings Card
description:
A truly unique gift card, drawn by Victoria and perfect to let someone know you care! 

Each 'Oh Floral Heart' card comes with a crisp, recycled paper brown envelope wrapped in a delicate glassine bag ready to post to your loved ones.

Choose from either a single greetings, or a pack of five cards.

...

Materials and Dimensions
148mm x 148mm

Thick 325gsm, FSC credited paper stock. With a light matte coating on the outside, the inside is left uncoated, making it easier for you to write your own message.

name: Pretty Paper Butterflies Confetti - Teal
description:
A set of fifty pretty paper butterflies just waiting for you to bring them to life. Just fold their wings and play!

The perfect accessory for a Spring wedding or Summer tea party, these beautiful butterflies can be used as favours, table decorations, or extra special confetti. We also love to garnish cupcakes with them and stitch them together to make delightful garlands.

Each set of butterflies also comes with a list of joyful and creative suggestions for you to try at home!

Designed from Victoria's original illustrations and made solely in the UK, you can rest assured that they are a guilt-free gift for many occasions.

...

Riso-printed with soy-based ink on 100% recycled paper, packaged in a traditional glassine envelope. Designed, printed and handmade in the UK.

Approximately 50 life-size butterflies per pack in an A6 glassine envelope. Each butterfly measures 4cm x 3cm.

name: Nature Girl Butterfly Charm Bracelet
description:
A delicate silk and brass charm bracelet, adorned with butterfly and diamond charms taken from Victoria's original illustrations.

Handmade in The Aviary studio at our jewellery bench, the pretty charms are expertly sawn, filed and glazed before being attached to sturdy brass rings and hand-woven vintage silk cord. Each bracelet fastens with a small, secure lobster clasp.

Perfect for summer festival season, and to exchange with friends. 
... 
Dimensions: 
Bracelet length - approximately 18.5cm/7.25 inches
Butterfly - 3cm x 2cm 
Diamond - 1.5cm x 1.5cm

IF YOU REQUIRE A DIFFERENT SIZE, PLEASE MESSAGE US.

name: Scattered Feathers 18" x 18" Organic Cotton Cushion
description:
A delicate multi-directional pattern of scattered feathers across the surface of this hand-made cushion, produced from one of Victoria's original illustrations.

Digitally printed, soft, organic cotton front with a natural cotton-linen reverse. 

Please select whether you would like a feather cushion pad included for an additional £8. 
Please allow up to 7 days for your cushion to be made and sent. 
...

Dimensions: 
Imperial: 18" x 18" square 
Metric: 46cm x 46cm square

...

Care instructions: 
Delicate machine wash warm or cool on a gentle/delicate setting, using phosphate-free detergent. Turn cushion cover inside out before cleaning.

name: Nature Girl Moth Necklace
description:
A delicate little necklace, featuring one of Victoria's original illustrations of a Hawk Moth translated into solid brass.

Handmade in The Aviary studio at our jewellery bench, each moth is expertly sawn from brass, then filed, glazed and suspended from small yet sturdy trace chain, which closes with a lobster clasp and diamond charm.

...

Moth - 3cm x 1.5cm
Chain - 22.5cm drop on a 45cm chain

name: So In Love With Summer - Illustrated Locket Pendant
description:

Handmade in The Aviary studio at our jewellery bench, each pendant is expertly sawn, filed and glazed before being suspended from a delicate yet sturdy brass chain, which closes with a secure lobster clasp and diamond charm. 

The locket is fully-functional, and can house a small photograph once the wild flower seeds within have been scattered. 
...
Dimensions:
Locket - 3cm x 2.5cm
Butterfly - 3cm x 2cm
Chain - 30cm drop from a 50cm chain

name: Dazzling Diamond Stickers
description:
A set of 10 'dazzling diamonds' created from Victoria's original illustrations. 

Printed professionally on matte, heavyweight adhesive paper stock.

Packaged in a darling little glassine envelope, and ready to adorn and embellish correspondance, gifts, notebooks and more.

...

Each sticker measures 37mm x 37mm
Glassine envelope 75mm x 100mm

name: Gold Scattered Feathers Luxury Gift Wrap Paper
description:
Beautiful sheets of matte gold feathers, sprinkled across 100% recycled, uncoated paper stock to make your festive gifts sparkle.

This pattern has been created from Victoria's original illustrations, so you won't find it anywhere else.

Risograph printed in the UK using soy-based inks.

Each pack contains four A3 sheets lightly folded in half and presented in a pretty glassine sleeve. 

If you would prefer your sheets to be rolled, please select this option at the checkout. There is an additional £2 charge to cover the extra postage.

...
Dimensions: 420mm x 297mm


The Risograph is an environmentally friendly printer which uses soy based inks to produce unique quality outcomes. Each screen is made from banana paper, and produces minimum waste. Good for you, and good for the environment!

name: Illustrated Antique Lens Pendant - silver
description:
'Things We Found in the Fields' is a series of hand-made Fine Art jewellery to be worn and treasured for years to come.

The pendants are individually made by Victoria in The Aviary studio. She transfers her illustrations onto the beautiful antique opticians glass test lenses, before wrapping each one in a hand screen-printed vintage linen handkerchief. They come presented in a truly special match-box style case so make an ideal gift for a loved one.

"See beauty in the everyday, find pleasure in the simple things, wear these pendants as a reminder of such moments, use the handkerchiefs to protect future found treasures..."

Choose from nine original illustrations; the bird in flight, butterfly, flower, feather, bird skull, hawkmoth, weed seedling, bumble bee and diamond.
...

Each pendant is unique so may vary ever so slightly in size and weight. They are suspended from precious stirling silver chain and close with a delicate but secure stirling silver clasp.

The vintage handkerchiefs may also vary slightly in design and size from those pictured. The pendant images have been heat treated and sealed, but treat them gently. Keep away from water and strong fragrance. Not suitable for small children.

Dimensions: 

Antique illustrated lens measure approximately 3 x 3cm and the chain drop is 30cm. Presentation box measures 14.5 x 14.5 x 3cm.

name: Stray Cats and Forgotten Gardens - Illustrated Greetings Card
description:
A truly unique gift card, drawn by Victoria and perfect to let someone know you care!

Each 'Stray Cats & Forgotten Gardens' card comes with a crisp, recycled paper brown envelope wrapped in a delicate glassine bag ready to post to your loved ones.

name: Things We Found in the Fields - A3 Limited Edition Risograph Print
description:
'Things We Found in the Fields' is a single colour A3 risograph print made from an original, delicate illustration drawn this year.

It is black ink printed on crisp white 170gsm quality paper stock, and will be shipped on greyboard backing in a protective cellophane sleeve. Please note, the frame is not included.

The prints are a signed and numbered edition of just 30! 

...

Here's some interesting facts about risograph prints...

The risograph is an environmentally friendly printer which uses soy based inks to produce unique quality outcomes. Each screen is made from banana paper and unlike litho printing only takes a single print for the screen to be fully inked and ready for printing.

name: Oh Martha - A3 Limited Edition Risograph Print
description:
This print has been created from an original, delicate illustration drawn in Autumn 2012 specifically for the 'Ghosts of Gone Birds' multi-disciplinary art and conservation project.

Single colour printed on crisp white 250gsm quality paper stock, shipped on greyboard backing in a protective cellophane sleeve. Please note, the frame is not included.

The prints are a signed and numbered edition of just 25 each!
Please select whether you would like BLACK or MATTE GOLD.

It is a memorial piece to Martha, the very last of her kind; a Passenger Pigeon. They were once the most numerous wild bird in existence, with flocks measuring up to a mile in length! How awful that we hunted them so much, and altered their habitat so greatly that they became extinct.

...

Here's some interesting facts about risograph prints...

The risograph is an environmentally friendly printer which uses soy based inks to produce unique quality outcomes. Each screen is made from banana paper and unlike litho printing only takes a single print for the screen to be fully inked and ready for printing.

name: Oh Floral Heart 13" x 19" Limited Edition Digital Print
description:
A beautiful, unframed, limited edition print of a collection of fallen roses in the shape of a heart.

This edition of just fifty fine art prints has been made from an original illustration, delicately drawn and coloured by Victoria in The Aviary studios within the heart of the Kent countryside.

A perfect addition to the home for nature lovers, newly weds, or a truly lovely gift for Valentine's Day.

Each print is signed and dated by the artist, and comes wrapped in cellophane on recycled board or sent in a protective tube. Please note, frame not included.

Made from:
Printed in full colour on archival, acid-free Somerset cotton rag paper stock.

Dimensions:
13 x 19 inches / 48.26cm x 33cm

name: Pan Pendant (Deluxe-Silver)
description:
As featured on 'Domestic Sluttery'. 

This necklace, inspired by J.M Barrie's Peter Pan, is made from an original antique silver thimble which holds a hand turned oak acorn.

The pendant comes with a silver rope chain and a display box, hand made from reclaimed wood, which opens like a book. 
Inside is the passage from Peter Pan, printed on antique book pages.

MADE TO ORDER. Please allow up to 3 weeks to receive your pendant.

...

Dimensions:
Display Box - H 12cm L 8cm D 3.5cm
Acorn/Thimble - (Varying) Approx 2cm

...

In keeping with J.M Barrie's wishes, 10% of profits will go to Great Ormand Street hospital.

name: Little Garden Bird Keyring
description:
Create your own domestic aviary with these darling little wooden bird keyrings created from original illustrations by Victoria.

Choose from six popular British garden birds attached on a quality keychain: the sparrow, wren, goldfinch, blue tit, robin or crested tit each individually handmade and glazed.

They come housed in their own paper birdhouse, and the pretty packaging is made from 100% recycled paper and biodegradable cellophane. Please note, the little birds are printed on one side only.
...

Made by hand from reclaimed wood and glazed for added protection. It is advisable to keep this item away from strong perfumes and water. Not suitable for very young children.

...

Measurements: approximately 6cm in length from beak to tail tip on a 2.5cm split ring

name: Gift Wrapping Service
description: Want your purchase beautifully wrapped? No problem! Just add this 'item' to your basket.
